caption.p: Two environments ( A, B) with the same mean state m E can both be in one of two states (A L & A H; B L & B H) with equal frequency but with different ranges (range A<range B). It can be seen that because of the convex pattern the mean system response differs between environments A and B (m A<m B) despite A and B having the same average.
